Trusted by clubs from all over the world.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2020/12/All-logos.png” alt=”Trusted by clubs from all over the world” title_text=”Trusted by clubs from all over the world” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” module_class=”reverse” _builder_version=”3.25″ module_alignment=”center”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”vertical-align” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”rgba(47,50,54,0.8)” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_2_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.1em” custom_margin=”|||” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_line_height_tablet=”1.4em” text_line_height_phone=”” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_2_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_2_font_size_phone=”” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

Stay connected with
messaging and wall posts

Use the wall to share posts, videos, and files with precisely whom you need to. With push-notifications and direct messaging, nobody misses out on important updates. Chat with players, coaches, and more individually or form group chats so everyone stays on the same page.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”vertical-align” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2020/11/Communication.png” alt=”Messaging, wall posts, and calendar” title_text=”Communication” show_bottom_space=”off” align=”center” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ max_width_tablet=”70%” max_width_phone=”90%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” max_height=”100%” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”off|desktop” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”700ms” animation_intensity_slide=”14%” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px”]

Attach training sessions
to the calendar

The 360Player calendar is packed with smart features so you can input important data to training and match events. Attach videos or stats to matches, or even add session plans to practice events so everyone knows exactly what needs to be accomplished. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_class=”padding-override” _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” module_class=”reverse” _builder_version=”3.25″ module_alignment=”center”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”vertical-align” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”rgba(47,50,54,0.8)” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_2_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.1em” custom_margin=”|||” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_line_height_tablet=”1.4em” text_line_height_phone=”” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_2_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_2_font_size_phone=”” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

Share files, collaborate,
and achieve more

Sharing information throughout your team or club has never been easier! From training plans, statistics, and analysis, everyone within the organization can stay at the top of their game.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”vertical-align” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2020/10/club-methodology.png” title_text=”club methodology” show_bottom_space=”off” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ max_width_tablet=”70%” max_width_phone=”90%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||-10px” custom_margin_phone=”||0px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”700ms” animation_intensity_slide=”14%” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px”]

Tailor the experience
to your organization

Build organizational structures to suit the needs of your entire team or club. For example, you can create specific groups for only goalkeepers, injured players, or coaches. You also have the ability to follow up with any team, or group, in real time.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_class=”padding-override” _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” module_class=”reverse” _builder_version=”3.25″ module_alignment=”center”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”vertical-align” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”rgba(47,50,54,0.8)” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_2_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.1em” custom_margin=”|||” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_line_height_tablet=”1.4em” text_line_height_phone=”” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_2_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_2_font_size_phone=”” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

Protect your privacy
safely and securely

The 360Player platform is always compliant with privacy regulations. Where parental consent is required, 360Player has the entire process covered. This ensures that you and your team can spend more time focusing on other important things without privacy concerns.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”vertical-align” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2019/09/GDPR3.png” show_bottom_space=”off” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ width=”40%” max_width_tablet=”70%” max_width_phone=”90%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||-10px” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”700ms” animation_intensity_slide=”14%” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px”]

Access all your favorite tools
in one convenient place

Communication is just one part of the 360Player platform. Get everything you need for your team in one place including session plans, statistics, individual development plans, video analytics, and much more!
